description: Application to vary condition 2 (plan numbers) of planning permission ref: P2014/0163/S73 dated 28/03/2014.  Variations to include: increase in height of plant enclosures and associated louvres, 2no. additional flues, 3no. additional ladders over the existing parapets and extension of the the low level plant enclosure on the western side of the building including the extension of the north, south and west facades by 1m in each direction and new glass balustrade.
decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 02/07/2016.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 92/07/2013 ref P2013/0916/FUL.    Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
